title: Renowned Rome Art Deco Retreat near Spanish Steps with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Rooftop Terrace
description:
This Roaring Twenties gem is more than a place to crash, it's a feast for the senses. Swoon over vintage-chic decor as you settle into your room, then head for a zesty Aperol spritz in Bar Locarno's courtyard, a venue favoured by Rome's most fashion-forward for the past 100 years.

When hunger strikes, the kitchen has you covered with mouthwatering Italian fare, welcoming you to dine wherever you please - in the garden, on the roof, beyond your bedroom door. Then consider living out your Roman Holiday fantasies by hiring a retro Vespa and zipping through the cobblestone streets and along the Tiber River.

title: Romantic Rome Baroque Retreat near Borghese Gardens with Rooftop Terrace & Daily Breakfast
description:
Travel back to the romantic baroque period with a stay at this extravagant and antique hotel in the centre of Rome. Located in the historical heart of the ancient city, the palatial property is perfectly positioned for days spent exploring the cobblestone streets, passing by world-famous sights like the Spanish Steps, the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain and the Pantheon. Join the swathes of fashionistas shopping up a storm on the nearby Via Veneto and Via del Corso, or head to Barberini train station for a 10-minute ride to the Vatican.

Lose a few hours in the thermal bath-inspired spa, offering a Turkish bath, sauna and relaxation area, or venture to the panoramic rooftop terrace, where you can drink in breathtaking vistas of Rome over breakfast.

title: Romantic Heritage Retreat in the Heart of Rome with Rooftop Terrace & Daily Breakfast
description:
Travel back to the romantic baroque period with a stay at Hotel Romanico Palace & Spa, an extravagant and elegant luxury hotel in the centre of Rome. Located in the historical heart of the ancient city, the palatial property is perfectly positioned for days spent exploring the cobblestone streets, passing by world-famous sights like the Spanish Steps, the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain and the Pantheon. Join the swathes of fashionistas shopping up a storm on the nearby Via Veneto and Via del Corso, or head to Barberini train station for a 10-minute ride to the Vatican.

Marble floors, handpainted frescoes, antique furniture and damask fabrics are standard across the rooms and suites of Hotel Romanico Palace & Spa, evoking a sumptuous sense of luxury and indulgence. Lose a few hours in the thermal bath-inspired spa, offering a Turkish bath, sauna and relaxation area, or venture to the panoramic rooftop terrace, where you can drink in breathtaking vistas of Rome over breakfast.

title: Rome Upscale Escape near Vatican City with Daily Breakfast & One Two-Course Dinner
description:
Explore the wonders of Rome with a stay at NH Collection Roma Centro, an upscale escape around the corner from some of the city’s most famous attractions. Located in the sophisticated neighbourhood of Prati, the hotel has a sleek, contemporary feel, lending an air of refinement to your stay. Soothing neutral tones with grey and gold accents dominate the space, while minimalist décor creates a classy, modern atmosphere in every room.

Made for travellers looking to explore the best on offer in Italy's capital, NH Collection Roma Centro is within walking distance of two metro stations. It's also just a 25-minute walk from Vatican City and St. Peter’s Square, a 15-minute stroll from the delicious restaurants of Piazza Navona, and 20 minutes from the breathtaking Pantheon. Plus, just around the corner, you’ll find Via Cola di Rienzo, an extensive shopping street known for its abundance of high-end brands.
offer_address: Via dei Gracchi, 324, 00192 Roma RM, Italy

title: Rome Urban Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Guaranteed Upgrade
description:
Cardo Roma is where ancient Roman tradition meets modern Roman rhythm, an urban oasis that pulses with the energy of contemporary Rome while honouring its storied past. Discover local treasures like the marble-clad Palazzo della Civiltà Italiana, historic Basilica of Saint Paul and ancient Forte Ostiense right on your doorstep.

Indulge your senses at Vertici, the main restaurant where authentic Italian flavours take center stage, or unwind at Vertici Bar with carefully curated local wines and delicate small plates. When the sun beckons, Spectio Pool Bar serves expertly crafted cocktails alongside the sparkling waters, while Olea Spa & Wellness offers a mindful retreat for body and soul.

Every corner of Cardo Roma has been meticulously crafted as a sanctuary for self-discovery, where well-being is woven into the very fabric of your stay. With the Colosseum and Rome's walkable city centre just a 14-minute metro journey away, this serene escape nurtures both reflection and urban exploration.

title: Central Rome 19th-Century Palazzo Style Escape Near Trevi Fountain with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the epitome of Italian elegance at this artistically restored 19th century jewel in the heart of Rome's historic city centre. This high-end retreat, a comfortable distance from the Villa Borghese gardens, Pantheon and the Spanish Steps, offers an intimate hideaway with breathtaking city views. 

Savour authentic Italian cuisine at Settimo Roman Cuisine & Terrace, an elegant rooftop lounge and restaurant offering panoramic views of the Eternal City. Explore the nearby Trevi Fountain, Colosseum and Roman Forum, or shop at the high-end boutiques of Via Condotti - it's a Roman Holiday you deserve.

title: Stay Near the Iconic Trevi Fountain and Colosseum
description: Experience many romantic evenings in Roma with an authentic Italian stay at Romanico Palace Luxury Hotel & Spa, a grand, classic townhouse located in the heart of the city near the Trevi Fountain, Colosseum, Villa Borghese Gardens and Via Veneto shopping and dining area. Includes daily breakfast, a bottle of Prosecco on arrival, one-time access to hotel’s spa featuring Turkish bath, sauna and Irish shower, discounts on hotel services and a welcome drink each.
location_description: Romanico Palace Luxury Hotel & Spa OLD

title: Rome Escape within Walking Distance of the Colosseum
description: Experience the local trattorias, ancient architecture and cosmopolitan culture of Rome with an escape in the heart of the city at Dei Borgia Hotel. Stay within walking distance of some of Rome's most iconic landmarks including the Colosseum, Pantheon, Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink each on arrival, access to the blissful spa and one cocktail per person.

title: Historic Central Rome Boutique Escape Near Spanish Steps with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Situated on Rome's historic Via Margutta, this boutique hotel is a haven of contemporary elegance and tradition. Once a revered boarding school, it has recently undergone a renovation and reemerged as a beacon of elevated luxury in one of Rome's most affluent neighbourhoods.

Each room is decked out with exquisite furnishings, creating an atmosphere that echoes the artistic legacy of the Eternal City. Sip on a timeless Negroni from the Margutta Bar before unwinding in the interior courtyard amidst the Italian capital's dynamic energy.

The hotel's prime location puts some of Rome's most famous landmarks, such as the Trevi Fountain and legendary Spanish Steps, within easy reach. Whether strolling through museums and galleries or sampling authentic Roman cuisine in a nearby trattoria, every moment of your stay will be infused with the spirit of la dolce vita.

title: Trendy Rome Retreat near Villa Borghese with Daily Breakfast & EUR30 Dining Credit
description:
Among eclectic furnishings and chic mid-century Italian design touches, soak up the vibrant charm of Italy's capital city. A fittingly stylish retreat in the heart of Rome's fashion-forward Parioli district, this boutique hotel claims an excellent position for guests hoping to explore the iconic European destination with Villa Borghese and the bustling Via Veneto just steps away.

Between enjoying bowls of authentic pasta in Rome's famous piazzas, unwind at the hotel's light-filled restaurant, Elio, where you can indulge in boozy brunches and sumptuous wine-fueled dinners. Start your day with a buttery croissant and coffee at Cugino, and return later for a refreshing, expertly crafted nightcap. For art and culture enthusiasts, the National Gallery of Modern Art, the Colosseum and the Pantheon are all just a short drive away.

title: Heritage Castle Stay Close to Rome
description: Step back in time with a five-night stay at Castello della Castelluccia, an exclusive hotel housed in a 13th century castle on the outskirts of Rome. Discover the tranquil Italian countryside and enjoy daily breakfast, unlimited access to the hotel's spa, one multi-course dinner with a glass of wine, a 25-minute massage and a refreshing cocktail each.
offer_address: Via Carlo Cavina 40, 00123 La Giustiniana, Italy

title: Renowned Rome Art Deco Retreat near Spanish Steps with Daily Breakfast & EUR50 Dining Credit
description:
This lavish Roaring Twenties gem is more than a place to crash - it's a feast for all of the senses. Swoon over vintage-chic decor as you settle into your exquisite room or suite, then head for a zesty Aperol spritz in Bar Locarno's romantic courtyard, an intimate venue favoured by the city's most fashion-forward for the past 100 years.

When hunger strikes, the kitchen has you covered with mouthwatering Italian fare, welcoming you to dine wherever you please - in the garden, on the roof, beyond your bedroom door. Then, tick off the city's main attractions or live out your Roman Holiday fantasies by hiring a retro Vespa and zipping through the cobblestone streets and along the Tiber River.

Includes daily breakfast, a bottle of Prosecco on arrival, one-time access to the hotel spa - featuring Turkish bath, sauna and Irish shower - discounts on hotel services and a welcome drink each.

Each room is decked out with exquisite furnishings, creating an atmosphere that echoes the artistic legacy of the Eternal City. Sip a spritz from the Lounge Bar before unwinding in the interior courtyard. 

The hotel's prime location puts some of Rome's most famous landmarks, such as the Trevi Fountain and Colosseum, within easy reach. Whether strolling through museums and galleries or sampling authentic Roman cuisine in a nearby trattoria, every moment of your stay will be infused with the spirit of la dolce vita.

description: Embrace the vibrant energy of Rome staying at the luxurious Palazzo Montemartini, a Radisson Collection Hotel, a five-star haven ideally located in the city’s most central and iconic neighbourhood - Termini. Discover the incredible ruins, artistic masterpieces and glorious sights of Italy's ancient capital as you enjoy daily breakfast, a bottle of wine, a welcome drink and a lavish dinner during your stay. Plus, city tax is included in your package.
location_description: Palazzo Montemartini Rome, A Radisson Collection Hotel
offer_address: Largo Giovanni Montemartini, 00185 Roma RM, Italy

title: Italian Elegance with Daily Breakfast and Indulgent Three-Course Dining Inclusions
description: Discover the century-old ruins, artistic masterpieces and vibrant energy of Rome staying at the Grand Hotel Ritz Roma, located in one of the city’s most affluent neighbourhoods. Explore Rome’s iconic sites like the Colosseum, the Pantheon and the Imperial Fora while enjoying daily breakfast, two three-course dinners at the hotel’s restaurant, a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival, a 10% discount at the hotel’s restaurant and a 10% discount on access to the blissful in-house spa.

title: Charming Rome Retreat near Villa Borghese with Daily Breakfast, Hotel Credit & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description:
Among eclectic furnishings and chic Italian design touches, soak up the vibrant charm of Italy's capital. A stylish retreat in the heart of Rome's fashion-forward Parioli district, this boutique hotel claims an excellent position for exploring, with Villa Borghese gardens and the bustling Via Veneto just steps away.

Between enjoying pasta in Rome's famous piazzas, unwind at the light-filled Elio restaurant, where you can indulge in boozy brunches, sumptuous dinners and delectable wines. Start the day with a croissant and coffee at Cugino and return later for an expertly crafted nightcap.

title: Heritage Elegance in the Heart of Rome with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Uncover the secrets of the Eternal City from its ancient heart with a five-star stay at the ultra-luxurious Anantara Palazzo Naiadi Rome Hotel. Centrally located, this historic hotel puts all of Rome's treasures at your fingertips, from the Pantheon to the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps and the adjacent Vatican City. Between exploring ancient ruins, scooter-lined laneways and glittering churches, stop off for a crispy pizza or authentic pasta - not to mention a serving of gelato or Italian coffee. Return to your palatial hotel where 19th-century marble architecture, handpainted frescos and antique furniture evoke a sense of indulgence. 

Lose a few hours in the spa, or venture to the panoramic rooftop pool terrace - a rarity in Rome - where you can plunge into the glittering waters amid breathtaking city vistas.

title: Palatial Rome Baroque Opulence near Borghese Gardens with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Terrace
description:
Wrapped in the artistic aura of Rome, prepare to be swept away by the extravagant baroque charms of this vintage hotel perfectly nestled in the city centre. Located in the heart of the Eternal City, this luxurious property is a testament to Rome's rich history, reflected in the hotel's themed rooms, decadent fresco art and antique furniture, all accentuated by Romanesque design elements.

Get your fill of Roman history and culture by exploring the cobblestone streets, passing by world-famous sights like the Spanish Steps, the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain and the Pantheon, all set mere moments from the hotel. Join the swathes of fashionistas and indulge in retail therapy at the nearby Via Veneto and Via del Corso.

Back at the property, indulge in the thermal bath-inspired spa, offering a Turkish bath, sauna and relaxation, or venture to the panoramic rooftop terrace, where you can take in breathtaking vistas of Rome over a hearty breakfast.

title: Italian Elegance in the heart of Rome
description: Experience the local trattorias, ancient architecture and cosmopolitan culture of Rome with five nights in the heart of the city at Hotel dei Borgia. Stay within walking distance of the Colosseum, Pantheon, Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, welcome drinks, spa access, cocktails and more at the hotel.

title: Experience Italian History at Rome's Oldest Hotel
description: Stay in the heart of historic Rome, Italy, in the city’s oldest hotel - Hotel Sole al Pantheon, est. 1467. Nestled in an unbeatable location opposite the iconic Pantheon and close to the Trevi Fountain and Spanish Steps, every room in this historic hotel is entirely unique. Enjoy an unforgettable four-night city stay with daily breakfasts, prosecco on arrival and more.
offer_address: Piazza della Rotonda, 63, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

title: Heritage Roman Stay in the Heart of the Historic City with Daily Breakfast
description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Rome, discovering the century-old ruins, artistic masterpieces and glorious sights of the capital of Italy, staying in the heart of it all at Hotel Forum. title: Central Rome Boutique Retreat near the Trevi Fountain with Daily Breakfast & EUR60 Dining Credit
description:
Set in a restored 17th-century palazzo on Via del Corso, this luxury hotel exudes old-world grandeur with gilded mirrors, frescoes and marble details. Its prime location places the Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and Pantheon just moments away.

Wander Via del Corso for upscale shopping or soak up the Italian lifestyle at nearby piazzas and trattorias. Dine on local cuisine with international flair at The Core Restaurant, unwind with an aperitif at The Bar, or enjoy a relaxing evening at The Music Lounge. Whether you're seeking romance or exploration, Palazzo Roma captures the true essence of _la dolce vita._

title: Trendy Rome Retreat near Villa Borghese with Daily Breakfast & EUR30 Dining Credit
description:
Among eclectic furnishings and chic mid-century Italian design touches, soak up the vibrant charm of Italy's capital city with a stay at The Hoxton, Rome. A fittingly stylish retreat in the heart of Rome's fashion-forward Parioli district, this boutique hotel claims an excellent position for guests hoping to explore the iconic European destination with Villa Borghese and the bustling Via Veneto just steps away. Between bowls of authentic pasta in Rome's famous piazzas, relax in the comfort of the hotel's light-soaked restaurant, Elio, to indulge in boozy brunches and sumptuous wine-fuelled dinners.

Stop off at Cugino for a buttery croissant and coffee before venturing out only to return later that day for a refreshing and expertly crafted nightcap. For art and culture enthusiasts, the National Gallery of Modern Art, Colosseum and the Pantheon are all just a short drive away.

title: Stay in the Heart of Rome Within Walking Distance of the Colosseum
description: Experience the local trattorias, ancient architecture and cosmopolitan culture of Rome with an escape in the heart of the city at Dei Borgia Hotel. Stay within walking distance of some of Rome's most iconic landmarks including the Colosseum, Pantheon, Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink each on arrival, access to the blissful spa and one cocktail per person.

title: Modern Rome Retreat near the Colosseum with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the allure of Italy's eternal city with a stay at H10 Roma Citta, a modern sanctuary nestled in the stylish Marconi district. This contemporary escape sits between the Testaccio and Trastevere neighbourhoods, renowned for their local eateries and nightlife and perfect for visits to iconic sites like the Colosseum, Roman Forum or Vatican City. You'll discover all of Rome's dramatic ruins, romantic culture and charismatic street life from this stylish launchpad.

When it's time to retreat to your stylish accommodation, feel the city buzz from the rooftop terrace and slow things down with an aperitivo. Savour authentic Italian cuisine at the UNO ZERO UNO restaurant or sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the Lobby Bar before retiring to your private sanctuary, home to modern stylings and cosy bedding.

title: Charming Roman Forum Retreat with Rooftop Terrace, Daily Breakfast & Daily Prosecco
description: Immerse yourself in the ethereal splendour of the Eternal City with a stay at the history-clad H10 Palazzo Galla - a tranquil oasis overlooking the Roman Forum. Located in the sophisticated neighbourhood of Trevi, this charming, modern hotel was made for travellers looking to explore the best of the Italian capital. Discover Rome's dramatic ruins, romantic culture and charismatic street life on your doorstep. Feel the city buzz from the rooftop terrace, and slow things down with an aperitivo such as a Negroni. When you’re ready to retire for the night, there is nowhere better to lounge than in your private sanctuary, featuring neutral tones with gold and coral accents that are reminiscent of the local architecture.
offer_address: Via Quattro Novembre, 102,  Piazza Venezia 00187, Rome, Italy

title: Stay in the Heart of Rome Within Walking Distance to the Colosseum
description: Experience the local trattorias, ancient architecture and cosmopolitan culture of Rome with a five or seven-night stay in the heart of the city at Hotel dei Borgia. Stay within walking distance of the Colosseum, Pantheon, Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, welcome alcoholic drink on arrival, access to the blissful spa and two cocktails to share.

title: Charming Roman Neighbourhood Escape with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Situated in the romantic Roman neighbourhood of Trastevere, this boutique hotel is a haven of contemporary elegance and tradition. Italian style and contemporary comfort blend throughout the 35 rooms on site, with handcrafted furniture, marble accents and brass finishes.

The hotel’s prime location puts you in the middle of one of Rome's most beloved neighbourhoods, home to locally loved trattorias, hidden gem bars and queue-worthy gelaterias. After a day of exploring nearby museums, galleries and world-famous landmarks, return to sip on a spritz in the Lounge Bar and unwind in the interior courtyard, revelling in the spirit of la dolce vita.

title: Rome Oasis: Marconi Escape near Trastevere with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Step off the tourist trail and experience a more relaxed side of Rome at this sleek and peaceful base in the local-favourite Marconi district. Tucked between Testaccio and Trastevere - two of the city’s most character-filled neighbourhoods - this modern stay is ideal for those who want to explore the city like a local, then retreat somewhere calm at day’s end.

Well connected via nearby Piramide metro and Roma Ostiense station, you’ll have easy access to major landmarks without the crowds on your doorstep. After a day of navigating Rome’s ancient streets, wind down on the rooftop terrace with an aperitivo, cool off in the seasonal plunge pool, or savour house-made Italian favourites at UNO ZERO UNO restaurant.

title: Palace-Style Escape Near Rome's Trevi Fountain and Colosseum
description:
Discover authentic Italian elegance and tradition in the heart of the Eternal City with a stay at Hotel Romanico Palace: a grand townhouse in a fabulous location near the Trevi Fountain, Colosseum, Villa Borghese Gardens and the Via Veneto shopping and dining area. Includes daily breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival, one-time access to the hotel spa - featuring a Turkish bath, sauna and Irish shower - a welcome drink each and a 15% discount on dining, drinks and more.

description: Stay in the heart of Rome, just a short walk from the gardens of Villa Borghese, the Spanish Steps and more, at Ludovisi Palace hotel. Located in the fashionable Via Veneto area, the hotel is housed in a historic building that dates back to the 1900s. Included is daily breakfast and a welcome bottle of wine in the room on arrival.

vendor_name: Maison Roma Piazza di Spagna UNA Esperienze (formerly Hotel Art by The Spanish Steps)
title: Sophisticated Designer Luxury in Rome near Trevi Fountain
description: Silkscreens, bronze busts and Italian elegance: Maison Roma Piazza di Spagna UNA Esperienze has been crafted with passion and art, with each space striving to delight. The lobby - formerly an old chapel - and captivating interior courtyard are donned with original artwork, while the onsite Honesty Bar allows guests to make their very own concoctions, with various luxury drops, plenty of ice and garnishes available.
location_description: Maison Roma Piazza di Spagna UNA Esperienze

title: Five-Star Heritage Escape in the Heart of Rome
description: In the heart of the Italian capital, InterContinental Rome Ambasciatori Palace, an IHG Hotel features a seamless blend of contemporary design, five-star comfort and old-world glamour. This hotel is ideally placed to embark on a whirlwind tour of Rome: visit the Trevi Fountain just a 15-minute walk away or arrive at the bustling Piazza Navona in under 25 minutes on foot. After days spent exploring, return to the hotel and savour delicious Italian and American cuisine at the onsite Scarpetta NYC.
location_description: InterContinental Rome Ambasciatori Palace, an IHG Hotel

title: Modern Rome Escape with 900-Square-Metre Spa
description: The striking architecture, ancient history and culinary scene of Rome should be high on everyone's travel bucket list, and Crowne Plaza Rome St. Peter's, an IHG Hotel, is the perfect base. The famous Vatican Museum and the Sistine Chapel are just a short drive away - once you've had your fill of Michelangelo’s frescoes, return to your hotel and enjoy a dip in the swimming pool, a massage at the spa and indulge in mouthwatering meals and refreshing drinks at the four bars and restaurants.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's, an IHG Hotel

title: Rome Five-Star Boutique Escape near Spanish Steps with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description:
Experience high-end opulence and five-star indulgence at the boutique The First Roma Arte. Ideally located in the heart of Rome, within walking distance of the Museo dell'Ara Pacis, Flaminio metro station and Spanish Steps, The First Roma Arte offers an ideal mix of art-influenced elegance and modern comforts, while maintaining impeccable hospitality and authentic Italian style. Guests can sharpen their appetite with tantalising Mediterranean flavours at the Michelin-starred Acquolina restaurant or savour a long lunch before sunset drinks at Acquaroof - delivering breathtaking views of Rome.

Once you've had your fill, hit the streets and discover Rome's dramatic ruins, romantic culture and charismatic street life as you create your own lore exploring Italy’s hot-blooded capital. When you’re ready to retire for the night, there is nowhere better to lounge like an aristocrat than in your ultra-modern, spacious room or suite, all decorated with inspiring local art.
offer_address: Via del Vantaggio, 14, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

title: Romantic Heritage Retreat in the Heart of Rome with Rooftop Terrace
description:
Travel back to the romantic baroque period with a stay at the lavish Romanico Palace Luxury Hotel & SPA, an extravagant and elegant luxury hotel in the centre of Rome. Located in the historical heart of the ancient city, the grand traditional townhouse is perfectly positioned for days spent exploring the cobblestoned streets, passing by world-famous sights like the Spanish Steps, the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain and the Pantheon. Join the swathes of fashionistas shopping up a storm on the nearby Via Veneto and Via del Corso, or head to Barberini train station for a 10-minute ride to the Vatican.

Marble floors, handpainted frescos, antique furniture and damask fabrics are standard across the rooms and suites of Romanico Palace, evoking a sumptuous sense of luxury and indulgence. Lose a few hours in the thermal bath-inspired spa, which offers a Turkish bath, Irish shower, sauna, hydromassage pool with salty water and a relaxation area. Enjoy one of the two bars available at the hotel: the lobby bar is open all year round or during spring, summer and autumn, venture to the panoramic rooftop terrace, where you can drink in breathtaking vistas of Rome.

vendor_name: Parco Dei Principi Grand Hotel & SPA
title: Five-Star Spa Hotel in the Heart of Rome overlooking Villa Borghese Gardens
description:
Embrace Italian elegance from the five-star Parco Dei Principi Grand Hotel & SPA, a refined urban oasis in Rome's exclusive Parioli district, overlooking the breathtaking Villa Borghese park and gardens.

Take a relaxing stroll through the adjacent Villa Borghese or enjoy a 30-minute wander through cobbled streets and piazzas to the iconic Trevi Fountain. Back at the hotel, you'll find everything you need for the perfect retreat after days spent exploring top sites. Make use of a gorgeous open-air swimming pool, indulgent spa and three exceptional restaurants, including an outdoor bar and grill for those balmy European evenings
location_description: Parco Dei Principi Grand Hotel & SPA
offer_address: Via Gerolamo Frescobaldi, 5, 00198 Roma RM, Italy

title: Elegant Central Rome Escape with City-View Rooftop Pool
description:
Lap up the dolce vita lifestyle and discover the world-famous sights and tastes of Rome, staying at H10 Roma Città. You'll be perfectly placed for discovering gilt-lined churches hidden down the most unassuming of streets, getting lost in the vibrant nightlife and vino bars of the nearby Trastevere district, or admiring world-renowned buildings that have stood for thousands of years - all within a short stroll or drive of this sophisticated launchpad.

Rome at sunset is glorious - and there’s nowhere better to marvel at its ancient splendour than the hotel’s rooftop swimming pool, nestled above the glistening Tiber river. Home to exquisite world-class facilities, including the Uno Zero Uno restaurant and Despacio Beauty Centre, the jewel in the crown of this sophisticated hotel is its spectacular location within a 20-minute drive of the Colosseum, the Trevi Fountain and Basilica Saint Paul.
offer_address: Via Amedeo Avogadro, 35, 00146 Roma RM, Italy

title: Contemporary Rome City Escape with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Discover an oasis in the heart of Rome at this contemporary retreat, combining modern comforts with traditional Italian touches for an urban reprieve perfect after days spent exploring this historic city. Kick start your day at the onsite Uno Zero Uno restaurant, or venture out to discover local trattorias and bustling markets.  

Located beside the picturesque Trastevere district known for its lively laneways, restaurants and nightlife, this escape invites you to unwind after the day's adventures with its sparkling rooftop pool and jacuzzi, plus calming rooms and suites.
offer_address: Via Amedeo Avogadro, 35, 00146 Quartiere Marconi, Rome, Italy

title: Brand-New Rome Six Senses Hideaway near the Pantheon & Trevi Fountain
description: Take a remarkable trip back in time and immerse yourself in the history of the Eternal City with a luxurious stay at the stunning Six Senses Rome - a tranquil oasis hidden behind a UNESCO-listed facade overlooking Via del Corso. Admire the Roman-inspired architecture elegantly fused with modern accents of Travertine marble and oak wood details, then recharge within individually crafted rooms by renowned designer Patricia Urquiola. Feel the city buzz from an elevated vantage point - NOTOS rooftop terrace with sweeping city views - then slow things down at the calming Six Senses Spa and Roman baths or satisfy your hunger at BIVIUM. When adventure calls, visit the iconic landmarks on your doorstep, including Piazza Venezia, the Pantheon and the Colosseum.
offer_address: Piazza di San Marcello, 00187 Roma RM, Italy

title: Historic Five-Star Rome Escape on Iconic Via Giulia
description: Embrace Roman resplendence in the heart of the city’s historic Via Giulia with a five-star stay at Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George, an IHG Hotel, masterfully positioned amid endless galleries, upscale boutiques and artisanal cafes. After days exploring the Vatican, Piazza Navona and the Pantheon - all within easy strolling distance - soak the day away at the onsite Roman baths or enjoy aperitifs and antipasti at I Sofà Bar Restaurant & Roof Terrace and savour glorious Italian sunsets.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Rome-Eur Parco Dei Medici
title: Lush Resort-Style Rome Stay Near the Airport with Outdoor Pool, Bar & Restaurant
description: Enjoy a host of modern comforts at the ideally located Holiday Inn Rome - Eur Parco Dei Medici, an IHG Hotel. Just minutes from the city’s international airport, the hotel boasts a valuable vantage point to Rome’s infamous Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps and Pantheon, as well as a a variety of boutique shopping and gourmet eateries. After days spent exploring, stretch out, cocktail in hand, beside the glorious outdoor pool, or savor traditional Italian fare at La Serra restaurant.
location_description: Holiday Inn Rome - Eur Parco Dei Medici, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Viale Castello Della Magliana 65, Rome 00148, Italy

title: Five-Star Top-Rated Art Deco Luxury in the Heart of Rome
description: Immerse yourself in the art, culture and history of Rome at the five-star Baglioni Hotel Regina. Part of the prestigious Leading Hotels of the World collection, this Art Deco gem sits on the vibrant Via Veneto. Here, the city's most iconic sights are at your fingertips; from the awe-inspiring Colosseum to the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. At the end of long Roman nights, return to the sumptuous sanctuary of Baglioni Hotel Regina. Brunello Bar and Restaurant invites you to try the flavours of the Mediterranean, expertly crafted by Executive Chef Luciano Sarzi Sartori. Awaken the senses with an espresso at Caffè Baglioni or wind down completely at the spa, where massage rooms, a sauna, Turkish bath and jacuzzi await.
offer_address: Via Vittorio Veneto, 72 Rome Lazio 00187 Italy

title: Central Rome 19th-Century Escape near Villa Borghese with Rooftop Restaurant
description:
Perched on the edge of the verdant Villa Borghese gardens, this sanctuary combines French finesse with Italian passion. Unwind in sophisticated rooms adorned with designer touches, then ascend to the Settimo rooftop restaurant where panoramic views of the Eternal City complement traditional fare and handcrafted cocktails.

Just minutes from the Spanish Steps and heritage Piazza Barberini, you're ideally situated to explore Rome's cultural treasures. After exploring the grand Pantheon or strolling through charming Trastevere, retreat to your urban oasis to unwind or simply admire St. Peter's Basilica from the rooftop.
